doctext: the salvadoran armed forces and security corps have inflicted the following casualties on the enemy:  784 dead, 357 wounded.  the armed forces also seized the following equipment: 376 rifles, 3 carbines, 11 shotguns, 83 rocket launchers, 26 mortars, 8 machineguns, 17 submachineguns, 31 pistols, 17 radios.    this has been a report on the casualties inflicted by our glorious armed forces on the fmln (farabundo marti national liberation front) criminal terrorists.  the report included the war materiel seized in the last few hours from the fmln communists.
